question: Which of the following held the fort after the death of Saluva Narasimha for a brief period?
explanation: Narasa Nayaka who was appointed as regent for the two young sons of Saluva Narasimha, held fort during this interim period after the death of Saluva Narasimha. Thus from 1490 CE until his own death in 1503 CE, Narasa Nayaka handledÂ  the administrative affairs of Vijayanagar.
